intro: Thoa raya, commonly known as the golden shower tree, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Fabaceae and is characterized by its distinctive cascading clusters of yellow flowers. The plant has compound leaves and produces pods that contain seeds. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is also used in traditional medicine. Thoa raya thrives in warm, humid climates and requires well-drained soil for optimal growth.
